bizId.label: 业务 ID(App ID)
bizId.desc: Job 中登记的业务 ID(App ID in Job platform)

srcType.label: 源文件(Src File)
srcType.desc: 已归档构件[流水线路径/自定义路径](Artifact[Pipeline Build Path/Custom Path])

list.label: 已归档构件[流水线路径](Artifact[Pipeline Build Path])
已归档构件[自定义路径](Artifact[Custom Path])
远程服务器(File on Remote Server)

sourceIpListStr.label: 源IP[手工录入](Src IPs[Manual Input])
sourceIpListStr.placeholder: 请输入源 IP 列表(Please input source IP list:(cloud area id:ip))
sourceIpListStr.desc:
云区域:IP
如：82:172.1.2.3 (cloud area id:ip
ex: 82:172.1.2.3, separated by one of[,;] or a line break when there are few IPs)

srcDynamicGroupIdListStr.label: 源动态分组ID列表(Dynamic Group IDs)
srcDynamicGroupIdListStr.placeholder:
请输入动态分组ID（从CMDB获取）列表
如：brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1，多个ID之间用,;换行符中的任意一个进行分隔（注意：若对接蓝鲸6.x中的作业平台，请在动态分组ID前加上"具体的业务ID:"，对接5.x中的作业平台则不需要）
(Please input Dynamic Group IDs (Can be acquired from CMDB),ex: brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1, separated by one of[,;] or a line break when there are few IDs)(Important：please add "[AppID]:" before every Dynamic Group ID if you use this plugin to invoke Job in BlueKing6.0)
srcDynamicGroupIdListStr.desc:
动态分组ID
如：brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1
多个ID之间用,;换行符中的任意一个进行分隔（注意：若对接蓝鲸6.x中的作业平台，请在动态分组ID前加上"具体的业务ID:"，对接5.x中的作业平台则不需要）
(Dynamic Group IDs, ex:brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1, separated by one of[,;] or a line break when there are few IDs)(Important：please add "[AppID]:" before every Dynamic Group ID if you use this plugin to invoke Job in BlueKing6.0)

sourceAccount.label: 源文件机器执行账号(Src Account)
sourceAccount.placeholder: 请输入源服务器用户名(Please input an account to be used on source machines)

sourcePath.label: 源文件[绝对]路径(Source file absolute path on remote server)
sourcePath.placeholder: 输入源服务器操作系统上的绝对路径(Please input absolute path of source file on remote server)
sourcePath.desc: 不同目录中的同名文件会被覆盖(File with same name may be overwritten)

archivePath.label: 源[相对]路径[暂不支持通配符](Source Relative Path, wildcards not supported yet)
archivePath.getPlaceholder: (element) => { return element.srcType === 'PIPELINE' ? '已归档构件的相对路径，暂不支持*通配符' : element.srcType === 'CUSTOMIZE' ? '自定义版本仓库中的相对路径，暂不支持*通配符' : '请输入源服务器操作系统上的绝对路径'}

targetIpListStr.label: 目标IP[手工录入](Target IPs[Manual Input])
targetIpListStr.placeholder: 请输入目标 IP 列表(Please input target IP list:(cloud area id:ip))
targetIpListStr.desc:
云区域:IP
如：82:172.1.2.3 (cloud area id:ip
ex: 82:172.1.2.3, separated by one of[,;] or a line break when there are few IPs)

targetDynamicGroupIdListStr.label: 目标动态分组ID列表(Dynamic Group IDs)
targetDynamicGroupIdListStr.placeholder:
请输入动态分组ID（从CMDB获取）列表
如：brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1，多个ID之间用,;换行符中的任意一个进行分隔（注意：若对接蓝鲸6.x中的作业平台，请在动态分组ID前加上"具体的业务ID:"，对接5.x中的作业平台则不需要）
(Please input Dynamic Group IDs (Can be acquired from CMDB),ex: brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1, separated by one of[,;] or a line break when there are few IDs)(Important：please add "[AppID]:" before every Dynamic Group ID if you use this plugin to invoke Job in BlueKing6.0)
targetDynamicGroupIdListStr.desc:
动态分组ID
如：brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1
多个ID之间用,;换行符中的任意一个进行分隔（注意：若对接蓝鲸6.x中的作业平台，请在动态分组ID前加上"具体的业务ID:"，对接5.x中的作业平台则不需要）
(Dynamic Group IDs, ex:brcfabc2si9h3j4v3qb1, separated by one of[,;] or a line break when there are few IDs)(Important：please add "[AppID]:" before every Dynamic Group ID if you use this plugin to invoke Job in BlueKing6.0)

targetAccount.label: 目标机器执行账号(Target Account)
targetAccount.placeholder: 请输入目标机服务器用户名(Please input an account to be used on target machines)

targetPath.label: 目标机操作系统上的绝对路径(Target Path)
targetPath.placeholder: 请输入目标机操作系统上的绝对路径(Please input a target path to be used on target machines)

timeout.label: 最大运行时间(分钟)(Max Running Time(minutes))
timeout.desc: 分发的最大超时时间。如果超过这个时间，则流水线失败，但实际分发任务可能仍然在运行(Max Running Time, pipeline will fail if overtime but task on Job System may still be running)
